item.title: Resume
item.description: Robert Underwood rlu@robertlunderwood.com linkedin.com/in/robertlunderwood Postgraduate passionate about data science. Seeking to leverage and improve data analytical skills gained through education to improve business performance and drive decision making. EDUCATION AMERICAN UNIVERSITY, Washington, DC Master of Science in Analytics, June 2017 Relevant coursework: Database and Big Data, Applied Managerial Statistics, Business Intelligence, Business Insights Through Analytics, Predictive Analytics CARNEGIE MELLON UNIVERSITY, Pittsburgh, PA Bachelor of Science in Mathematical Sciences, May 2009
